2.caption_en:
A blank "Platform USP v5.0" canvas for mapping competitive value propositions, market players, conclusions, and a unique selling proposition, with a left-side vertical advantage↕disadvantage gradient arrow and a footer area for logos and metadata.

{
  "artifact_type": "canvas_template",
  "name": "Platform USP",
  "version": "v5.0",
  "purpose": "Tool for mapping value propositions (factors of competition), comparing market players, and defining conclusions and a unique selling proposition.",
  "language": "ENG",
  "layout": {
    "orientation": "landscape",
    "sections": [
      {
        "id": "left_axis",
        "label": "ADVANTAGE / DISADVANTAGE",
        "position": "left",
        "width": "narrow_column",
        "description": "Vertical gradient arrow indicating advantage at top (green) and disadvantage at bottom (red/orange)."
      },
      {
        "id": "value_propositions_area",
        "label": "VALUE PROPOSITIONS (Factors of Competition)",
        "position": "top_center",
        "height": "large",
        "description": "Wide plotting area with faint horizontal gridlines and a central dashed horizontal reference line for comparing competitor positions."
      },
      {
        "id": "market_players_strip",
        "label": "MARKET PLAYERS",
        "position": "middle",
        "height": "thin_strip",
        "description": "Horizontal strip beneath the value propositions area for listing or aligning market players."
      },
      {
        "id": "conclusions_and_usp",
        "label": "CONCLUSIONS / UNIQUE SELLING PROPOSITION",
        "position": "bottom",
        "height": "large",
        "description": "Bottom area split into left 'CONCLUSIONS' and right 'UNIQUE SELLING PROPOSITION' with a central dividing marker."
      },
      {
        "id": "footer",
        "label": "FOOTER / METADATA",
        "position": "very_bottom",
        "height": "footer_height",
        "elements": [
          "PIK circular logo",
          "platform USP v5.0 title area",
          "copyright and credit text: 'Part of the Platform Innovation Kit - the toolset for the platform generation'",
          "download URL (platforminnovationkit.com)",
          "creator credit (fastbreak.one)",
          "QR code",
          "additional small logo (fb one?)",
          "title input box"
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  "visual_style": {
    "border_color": "dark_teal",
    "background_colors": {
      "value_propositions_area": "white",
      "market_players_strip": "light_teal",
      "conclusions_and_usp": "white",
      "footer": "dark_teal"
    },
    "left_axis_gradient": {
      "top": "green",
      "middle": "yellow",
      "bottom": "red_orange"
    },
    "gridlines": "faint_horizontal",
    "reference_line": "dashed_horizontal_midline"
  },
  "found_text": {
    "labels": [
      "ADVANTAGE",
      "DISADVANTAGE",
      "VALUE PROPOSITIONS (Factors of Competition)",
      "MARKET PLAYERS",
      "CONCLUSIONS",
      "UNIQUE SELLING PROPOSITION",
      "PLATFORM USP v5.0",
      "TITLE"
    ],
    "footer_text": "Part of the Platform Innovation Kit - the toolset for the platform generation. Download at www.platforminnovationkit.com. Created by fastbreak.one"
  },
  "notes": "Template is empty and intended for stakeholders to populate competitor positions, advantages/disadvantages, conclusions, and the platform's unique selling proposition."
}
